name: Leech
description:
Leech was created by the PlagueOfMinds team for the June 2021 GMTK game jam.   The theme of "Joined Together" is satisfied by the main player's head dynamic which was procedurally animated.  The beginning and end of the "Leech" swap as part of the main movement mechanic:  thus the head and end of the leech are joined together!   Whist navigating the the mystic landscapes of the game one must evade the projectiles from enemy Trash Worms.   Thanks for playing!

NOTE:  All assets, code, music, etc. were created by the team during the jam.
